definition: to break/to destroy/to devastate/to ravage/to repress
to destroy/to damage/to ruin/to defame/to slander

sentences.english: The people's war has helped crush the feudal structure in the rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 人民戰爭摧毀了農村地區的封建制度。

sentences.english: The sophisticated system destroys enemy warheads through direct "hit-to-kill" technology. "It's like hitting a bullet with a bullet," Watkins says.
sentences.chinese: 系統利用命中即摧毀技術，摧毀敵方的彈頭。

sentences.english: The sophisticated system destroys enemy warheads through direct "hit-to-kill" technology. "It's like hitting a bullet with a bullet," Watkins says.
sentences.chinese: 系統利用命中即摧毀技術，摧毀敵方的彈頭。

sentences.english: They are able to cut through metal and are nearly impossible to destroy.
sentences.chinese: 它們可以切割金屬，也幾乎無法摧毀。

sentences.english: Last year, high winds stoked wildfires in Southern California and destroyed thousands of homes.
sentences.chinese: 去年，強烈的風勢加劇野火的災情，摧毀數千戶房屋。

sentences.english: The buzz droids are designed to disable, not destroy, enemy craft.
sentences.chinese: 蜂鳴機器人的設計目的是癱瘓，而非摧毀敵機。

sentences.english: Anger is a hurricane with the power to destroy.
sentences.chinese: 憤怒是擁有摧毀一切力量的颶風。

sentences.english: Will you be devastated, emotionally or financially, if you don't succeed?
sentences.chinese: 如果失敗的話，在情緒和財政上你是否會被摧毀？

sentences.english: The hurricane last night destroyed many survey markers.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚颱風摧毀了很多覘標。

sentences.english: Galvatron destroys him and leads the Decepticons against Earth.
sentences.chinese: 驚破天摧毀紅蜘蛛，領霸天虎反撲地球。

sentences.english: The terrorists' attack completely destroyed the twin towers in New York.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖分子的襲擊徹底摧毀了紐約的雙子塔。

sentences.english: With any luck all 3 of china's teams will be wiped out together during their training.
sentences.chinese: 運氣好的話這三個表演隊將會在訓練中一起被摧毀。

sentences.english: A four-inch piece of space junk can demolish a shuttle.
sentences.chinese: 一片四英尺的太空垃圾可以摧毀一架航天飛機。

sentences.english: In other words, OFHEO wasn't just regulating Fannie Mae, it was out to get Fannie Mae.
sentences.chinese: 也就是說，督察局不僅要規範房利美，還要摧毀它。

sentences.english: A king-size conundrum ruins ruined, twins who are both first.
sentences.chinese: 一座特大王室廢墟遭到摧毀，都是第一的雙胞胎。

sentences.english: The destruction of Maldek was premeditated.
sentences.chinese: 摧毀馬爾戴克是有預謀的。

definition: to topple (i.e. knock over)/to capsize/fig. to overturn (a regime, by plotting or subversion)/to undermine/to subvert
to destroy/to damage/to ruin/to defame/to slander
to sacrifice one's life/to sacrifice (sth valued)/beast slaughtered as a sacrifice
to attack/to accuse/to charge/an attack (terrorist or military)
